attributes.action: Install free/low costing period vending machines all over the UK
attributes.additional_details: Period Poverty is an uprising issue in the UK which could be easily reduced by installing these machines everywhere in the UK. This can also help reduce the stigma and shame behind periods and empower women.
attributes.background: Install period vending machines that distribute free/low costing sanitary products in all areas especially low income places.

rejection.details:
The Government isn't directly responsible for the provision or sale of sanitary products. You may wish to sign this petition: 


Fund free period products for all
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631616
